price: 92. Kaadu ken sahitak:sin yallittey aqbudak sugteeni annih teetiiy? Keenik iyyan.
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
